ComicInfo.Summary: An Intruder in the Mind!: Doc Samson shrinks the Hulk down so he can enter Glen Talbot's brain and try to restore his memories. While in Talbot's mind, the Hulk is attacked by a host of former friends and foes. Glen's memories are restored but Samson's machine accidentally shrinks the Hulk to nothingness.

ComicInfo.Title: An Intruder in the Mind!
